title: Storm and Shelter

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of memory swamp in storm, painful memories surfacing as violent weather, Evan caught in traumatic recall
Medium shot of Architect creating geometric shelter around Evan, absorbing the storm's violence into their patterns
Close on them in the eye of the storm, Architect holding space while Evan processes, both changed by weathering it together

transformation_notes: The memory swamp's storm represents trauma surfacing. The Architect learns to protect without trying to fix, creating space for healing rather than forcing it.
dialogue_rhythm: Urgent to calm, protection to presence
